unnormalised: Tor, konnem competitive poriksheak coaching class-am vixim mhozo anubhav vicharlo. To ek provass, mhunn sangtam! Hanv Guwahati laginchyea eka lhan xharacho, ani 12ven zalea uprant JEE crack korpacho dabav bhov vhoddlo aslo. Soglle coaching centre-amni bhorti zataale, ani ‘toppers’ soglle 11ve class thavn Aakash vo FIITJEE Delhi-khatir toyari kortale.
normalised: Tor, konnem mhaka competitive porikshe khatir coaching classes ghevncheancho anubhavacher vicharlem. Tech ek jinn, mhaka sangpak di! Hanv Guwahati laginchyea eka lhan ganvantlo, ani baravi zalea uprant J-E-E crack korpacho dabav khub aslo. Soglle coaching centeramnim bhortale, ani 'toppers' soglle eleventh class thavn Aakash vo F-I-I-T-J-E-E Delhi-nchi toeari kortale.

unnormalised: Mhojea painnanim, tanche bhogos divo, mhaka boreant bore zai aslem, dekhun mhoje 10ve board-a uprant, tannim mhaka eka sthanik coaching centre-ant bhorti kelem - ‘Sharma Tutorials.’ Tem national brand-anchi toxi fancy naxili, punn Mr. Sharma sir ek legend asle. Tannem JEE problems tachim mastkant solve kele, mhunn dista. Classes satolleant 6 dis astaale, dupari 4:00 vaztan thavn rati 8:00 vaztan porian, xalla zalea uprant. Katin, punn samballunk zathem.
normalised: Mhojea avoi-bapain, tankam besanv ghalunk di, mhaka borech zai aslem, mhunn mhoje baravi boarda uprant, tanim mhaka eka sthanik coaching centerant bharti kelem - 'Sharma Tutorials.' Tem rastriya brandanchea bhaxen fancy naslem, punn Mister Sharma sir ek legend aslo. Tannem J-E-E-chim problemam aplia mathian soddvon keleant, dislem. Class satolleant sat dis, char P-M thavn atth P-M meren asle, shallea uprant. Kathinn, punn sambhallunk zatolem.

unnormalised: Surveche thodde mhoine ek dhund aslem. Physics, Chemistry, Maths – soglle ekuch pavtt. Mhaje xalleche grades khala denvunk lagle. Mhaka ugddas asa hanvem mhoje ardhea-vorshiche porixent 60%-an kitench pass kelem. Avoi chintit asli; Pai mhunn tale, "Hi ek investment." Ami eka career counsellor-achi porian sala ghetli zannem BITSAT vo VITEEE sarkhea dusrea poriksheank prayatn korunk suchoilam, punn JEE nihit dhyey aslem, tum pollya.
normalised: Survateche thodde moine ekdom fuzle. Physics, Chemistry, Maths – sogllim eka torean. Mhoje shalleche grade khaltak lagle. Mhaka thodiuch yad asa ki hanvem sixty percent-an mhojea half-yearly poriksheak pass korunk pavlem. Avoi chintitleli; Bapain dharun dovorlem, "Tem ek investment." Ami ek career counselorachi-i sala ghetli zannem B-I-T-S-A-T vo V-I-T-E-E-E bhaxen dusrea poriksha khatir prayatn korunk sangllem, punn J-E-E uchch dhyey aslem, tumkam dista.

unnormalised: 12ve class-antlean, vostu tibrav zhaleo. Sharma Tutorials-an aizvar ani suttient extra classes vaddoile. Ami dor satolleant mock tests ghetele. Mhozo rank lagatar 2000 vidyarteam modlean sumarat 500 aslo. Bhov borem nhoi, bhov vaitt nhoi. Mhaka ek vishesh katin porixa ugddas asa 20/01/2018 dink zanntlem hanvem fokot 120/360 score kelo. Hanv itlo demotivate zalo, hanvem sumar-sumar soddun dilem.
normalised: Baravi classanim, vostu khub kathinn zalim. Sharma Tutorials-anim aitara ani suttiechea disanim extra classes vaddoile. Amchea lagim dor satolleant mock test asli. Mhozo rank don hazar vidheathiam moddle paanchshea bhomvtani astalo. Itlo boro nhoi, itlo vait-i nhoi. Mhaka ek khasgi toranchi kathinn test yad asa jem veesh January don hazar attharaak zalo zannen hanvem fokot eksho ani vis bhagela tin sho ani sat bhag keli. Hanv khub demotivated aslem, hanvem lagbhag soddun dilem.

unnormalised: Punn Mr. Sharma sir mhaka soddunk divchena. To mhunntalo, "Rohan, beta, IIT ekuch option nhoi. Thoi NITs, IIITs, ani state engineering colleges asat. Xikonkacher dhyan div, fokot porixa crack korpacher nhoi." To chukicho naslo, zori. Dabav mhaka lagunk laglo. Hanvem dor sokallim 30 mintam yoga ani meditation korunk survat keli. Tinnem thodea matren modot keli.
normalised: Punn Mister Sharma sir mhaka soddunk ditlem na. To mhunntalo, "Rohan, beta, I-I-T ekuch vikalp nhoi. N-I-T-s, I-I-I-T-s, ani state engineering collegeo asat. Xikunk dhyan di, fokot porixa crack korpacher nhoi." To barobar aslo, khoimcheanchoi. Dabav mhaka lagunk laglo. Hanvem yoga ani meditation dor eka sokallem tin minuttam korunk survat keli. Tannem thoddak tenko dilo.

unnormalised: Xevttak, vhoddlo dis ailo: JEE Main 08/04/2019 dink. Porikshechem centre 2 voram pois aslem, dekhun ami ghora thavn 6:00 AM voramni bhair sorle. Mhaka chinta ani utsahacho ek mix anubhav aila mhunn mhaka ugddas asa. Hanvem sumar-sumar 90 proxnancher 70 prayatn kele. Thode borem distale. Magir resultachi ravpachi ghadi aili.
normalised: Shevttim, vhodd divas ailo: J-E-E Main atthvea April don hazar ekunnisak. Porixechem kendr don horam pois aslem, dekhun ami ghorche thavn sokallem so A-M-ak bhair sorun gelem. Mhaka chinta ani uttejanacho ek misronn dislem. Hanvem lagbhag sattor bhagela novod porxnamcho prayatn kelo. Bare-bhaxen dislem. Uprant resultaachi vat polleunchem ailem.

unnormalised: Result bhair ailo, ani hanvem 25000 rank score kelo. IIT-ak puro zainaslem, punn NIT-ak puro aslem. Mhaka NIT Allahabad-ant Mechanical Engineering-ak bhitor mell’lo. Tem mhojem sopnachim branch vo mhojem sopnachim college naslem, punn to ek decent parinnam aslo. Sharma Sir khuxi aslo.
normalised: Result bhair sorun ailo, ani mhaka panchvis hazar rank mell'lli. I-I-T khatir puro nhoi, punn N-I-T khatir puro. Mhaka N-I-T Allahabad-ak Mechanical Engineering khatir zago mello. Tem mhojea sopnachem branch vo mhojem sopnachem college naslem, punn tem ek decent porinnam aslem. Sharma Sir khuxal asle.

unnormalised: Pattim polleun, coaching classes ek mix bage aslem. Tannem structure, discipline, ani ek competitive vatavaran dilo. Punn tannem dabav ani stress pan vaddoilo. Hanv tem portun kortolom? Zait. Punn hanv mhojea mastikachea bhoktek dhyan ditolom ani dusre options pan sodtolom. Muhrtvachem tem xikunk ani vaddonk, tum kuthun porian pavun ghe mhunn parva nastanna. Ani ugddas dovratat, engineering fuktachem safallyachem marg nhoi! Thoi medicine, design, arts, ani bhov fuddam asat! Fuktach tum kitem pashenat asat tem sodun kaddat.
normalised: Portun polletana, coaching classes ek misronn bag asle. Tannem rachan, shist, ani ek spardhik vatavaran dilo. Punn tannem khub dabav ani stress-i vaddoilo. Hanv portun kortolo? Hovui zata. Punn hanv mhojea manasik arogyacher-i dhyan ditolom ani dusre vikalp sodtlom. Muhache vostu tem xikun vadounk, tum khoimchem-i porinnam zata punn. Ani ugddas dovrunk, engineering fokot yes mellounk vatt nhoi! Thuim medicine, design, kala, ani khupuch chodd asa! Fokot tumkem kiteachea vixim utsuktai asa tem sodun kaddat.
